channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Azure DevOps Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Azure DevOps Server

item.title: CVE-2020-0700|2024-08-04T06:11:05.579Z -- microsoft -- azure%20devops%20server
item.description: A Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists when Azure DevOps Server does not properly sanitize user provided input, aka 'Azure DevOps Server Cross-site Scripting Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2020-1327|2024-08-04T06:32:01.196Z -- microsoft -- azure%20devops%20server
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists in Microsoft Azure DevOps Server when it fails to properly handle web requests, aka 'Azure DevOps Server HTML Injection Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2020-1326|2024-08-04T06:32:00.660Z -- microsoft -- azure%20devops%20server
item.description: A Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists when Azure DevOps Server does not properly sanitize user provided input, aka 'Azure DevOps Server Cross-site Scripting Vulnerability'.
